# The `CodeViewDebug` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Collects and handles line tables information in a CodeView format. <a href="#details">More...</a>

### switchToDebugSectionForSymbol() {#ad82b87f6cd740a2d76fabcac5cdf507a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void CodeViewDebug::switchToDebugSectionForSymbol (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; GVSym)</>}>
Switch to the appropriate .debug$S section for GVSym.

If GVSym, the symbol of an emitted global value, is in a comdat <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff">COFF</a> section, this will switch to a new .debug$S section in that comdat. This method ensures that the section starts with the magic version number on first use. If GVSym is null, uses the main .debug$S section.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/codeviewdebug-h/#l00253">253</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/codeviewdebug-h">CodeViewDebug.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/codeviewdebug-cpp/#l01009">1009</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/codeviewdebug-cpp">CodeViewDebug.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### TypeIndices {#a9e358b7d153a9c739e754c592a2780aa}

<MemberDefinition

Map from a pair of DI metadata nodes and its DI type (or scope) that can be nullptr, to CodeView type indices.

Primarily indexed by &#123;DIType&#42;, DIType&#42;&#125; and &#123;DISubprogram&#42;, DIType&#42;&#125;.

The second entry in the key is needed for methods as <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/disubroutinetype">DISubroutineType</a> representing static method type are shared with non-method function type.
